text: Bhim Lal Arya is an Indian politician and member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. Arya was a member of the Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly from the Ghansali constituency in Tehri Garhwal district.BJP submits petition against Ghansali MLA Bhim Lal AryaMy NetaUttarakhand floor test- A tale of 2 MLAs: Arya in, Arya out == References == Category:People from Tehri Garhwal district Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Uttarakhand Category:Members of the Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly Category:Living people Category:21st- century Indian politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Bhim Lal Arya
